AvenueQ:
The sun is shining, it's a lovely day,
阳光灿烂是美好的一天	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
A perfect morning for a kid to play,
一个完美的早晨去游玩	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
But you're got lots of bills to pay
但你要还很多账单	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
What can you do?
能怎么办	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)

Your work real hard and the pay's real low
你工作很努力薪水却很低	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
And every hour goes oh, so slow
每一小时都慢如泥	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
And at the end of the day there's no where to go
到最后却还是无处可去的境地	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
Back home to Avenue Q
回到大街区Q里	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
YouAreNotAlone:
Have you ever felt like nobody was there
你是否曾经感到没人陪好	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
Have you ever felt forgotten in the middle of nowhere
你是否曾经在人海中感觉被遗忘掉	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 15)
Have you ever felt like you could disappear
你是否曾经想过能消失掉	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
Like you could fall and no one would hear
像没人会听见你跌倒	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)

Well, let that lonely feeling wash away
让那孤独感觉洗刷一洗	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
Maybe there's a reason to believe you'll be okay
或许有理由相信你会过得很顺利	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 14)
Cause when you don't feel strong enough to stand
因为你太懦弱无法站立	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
You can reach, reach out your hand
伸出你的手可以	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

Even when the dark comes crashing through
即使黑暗来临时来袭	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
When you need a friend to carry you
当你需要朋友来载你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
And when you're broken on the ground
而当你已破碎一地	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
You will be found
会找到你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)

So let the sun come streaming in
就让阳光洒满房间	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise again
因为你会奋力再登巅	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
Lift your head and look around
抬起头四处看看	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
You will be found
你将发现	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)
OnlyUs:
I don't need you to sell me on reasons to want you
我不需要你来为我想你找理由	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
I don't need you to search for the proof that I should
我不需要你搜索证明我该有	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
You don't have to convince me
你不必说服我呦	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
You don't have to be scared you're not enough
你不必害怕你不够足够	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
'Cause what we've got going is good
因为我们的路好走	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)

I don't need more reminders of all that's been broken
我不需要更多提醒那些被伤坏	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
I don't need you to fix what I'd rather forget
我不需要你摆平我宁愿忘怀	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
Clear the slate and start over
清空黑板再重来	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Try to quiet the noises in your head
试着安静一下你的脑海	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
We can't compete with all that
那些我们争不来	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

So what if it's us?
就算我们呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
What if it's us And only us
只有我们怎么办呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
And what came before won't count anymore or matter?
过去发生的事都已不再重要了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
Can we try that?
试试看可	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)

What if it's you
若是你呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)
And what if it's me
但如果是我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
And what if that's all that we need it to be
那我们还需要什么呢如果	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
And the rest of the world falls away?
世界从此再没有昼夜	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
What do you say?
什么好说	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)

I never thought there'd be someone like you who would want me
从来没想过会有你这样一个人要我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 15)
So I give you ten thousand reasons to not let me go
所以我给你一万个理由不要放我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 14)
But if you really see me
但如果你真的见我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
If you like me for me and nothing else
如果你因为我而喜欢我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
Well, that's all that I've wanted for longer that you could possibly know
我一直想的更多远比你所了解的要多	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 16)
IMissTheMountains:
All these blank and tranquil years
那空白的岁月里	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Seems they've dried up all my tears
泪水被晒干似地	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
And while she runs free and fast
在她自由奔跑时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Seems my wild days are past
过去我好放肆	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)

But I miss the mountains
可我好想山上	(rhyme type: 12 scores: 0 len_constraint: 6)
I miss the dizzy heights
我想念高空椅	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
All the manic magic days
所有狂热的魔力	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
And the dark depressing nights
和阴霾的深夜里	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

I miss the mountains
我想念雪山	(rhyme type: 10 scores: 0 len_constraint: 5)
I miss the highs and lows
怀念高高低低	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
All the climbing all the falling
所有的攀登和跌倒	(rhyme type: 8 scores: 0 len_constraint: 8)
All the while the wild wind blows
狂野的风吹不熄	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Stinging you with snow
用雪刺痛你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
And soaking you with rain
用雨水淋湿你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
I miss the mountains
我怀念山里	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
I miss the pain
怀念痛惜	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)
YouDontKnow:
Do you wake up in the morning
早上你醒来有没有	(rhyme type: 9 scores: 0 len_constraint: 8)
And need help to lift your head
要别人帮忙抬起	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Do you read obituaries
你是否看报纸死	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
And feel jealous of the dead
与死人同感妒忌	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
It's like living on a cliffside
就似住在悬崖绝壁	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
Not knowing when you'll dive
不知何时潜入	(rhyme type: 5 scores: 0 len_constraint: 6)
Do you know, Do you know
你可曾可曾知	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
What it's like to die alive
生死离别情难寄	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

When a world that once had color
当曾经有颜色的世	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
Fades to white and grey and black
渐渐变淡灰白黑紫	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
When tomorrow terrifies you
当明天使你害怕时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
But you'll die if you look back
但回头你便会死	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

You don't know
你不知	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 3)
I know you don't know
我知你不懂	(rhyme type: 13 scores: 0 len_constraint: 5)
You say that you're hurting
你说你很伤痛	(rhyme type: 13 scores: 0 len_constraint: 6)
It sure doesn't show
看不出来	(rhyme type: 6 scores: 0 len_constraint: 4)
You don't know
你不知	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 3)
It lays me so low
压得我好低	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
When you say let go
当你说放手	(rhyme type: 9 scores: 0 len_constraint: 5)
And I say You don't know
我却说你未知	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
Popular:
Whenever I see someone less fortunate than I
每当我看到比我更不幸的人时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
And let's face it
且论正题	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)
Who isn't less fortunate than I?
谁不比我更有福气	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
My tender heart tends to start to bleed
温柔的心往往会开始	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)

And when someone needs a makeover
当某人需要翻新一下	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
I simply have to take over!
只有我必须接管它	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
I know, I know exactly what they need!
我知道他们需要的是啥	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)

And even in your case
而即使你是例	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
Though it's the toughest case I've yet to face
虽然是最难面对的案底	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
Don't worry, I'm determined to succeed!
放心吧我决心成功到底	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
Follow my lead
跟随我旨	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 4)

you will be Popular!
大家会喜欢你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
You're gonna be popular!
你会成为万人迷	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
I'll teach you the proper poise
我教你正确姿势	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
When you talk to boys
和男生聊起	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
Little ways to flirt and flounce
小小情调小风姿	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

I'll show you what shoes to wear!
告诉你什么鞋子	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
How to fix your hair!
该如何整理	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
Everything that really counts to be...
真正重要的是那些东西	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
POPULAR!
流行剂	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 3)
I'll help you be popular!
我会帮你涨人气	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

You'll hang with the right cohorts
你会结交好同伴	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
You'll be good at sports
你会运动健	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 5)
Know the slang you've got to know
懂你该懂的方言	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
So let's start
就开演	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 3)
'Cause you've got an awfully long way to go!
因为你的路途还长很遥远	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)

Don't be offended by my frank analysis
不要对我的分析感到被冒犯	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
Think of it as personality dialysis
就当是人格洗礼的一番修炼	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
Now that I've chosen to become a Pal, a sis or an advisor
既然我选择了成为牧师或姐妹或顾问官	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 17)
There's nobody wiser!
没有人比我更贤	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Not when it comes to POPULAR!
当流行音乐来临前	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
I know about popular
我知道流行的点	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
And with an assist from me
也得到了我的援	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
To be who you'll be
成为谁的你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: 0 len_constraint: 5)
Instead of dreary who you were...
而你已不再是从前	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
There's nothing that can stop you From becoming popu-ler...
没有什么能够阻止你成为流行之选	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 15)
RevoltingChildren:
Never again will she get the best of me,
我不会再任她随意去左右	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
Never again will she take away my freedom,
她再不会夺走我所有的自由	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
And we won't forget the day we fought for the right to be a little bit naughty.
我们不会忘记我们曾经为了一点小调皮而奋斗	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 20)
Never again, will the chokey door slam.
再也不会将沉重的门扣	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
Never again, will I be bullied and
我再也不会受欺侮了呦	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
Never again will I doubt it when my mummy says I'm a miracle.
再也不会怀疑当我妈妈说我是奇迹的时候	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 18)
Never again will we live behind doors
我们再也不会躲在门后	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)

We are revolting children, living in revolting times
我们是叛逆的一代活在叛逆时期	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 14)
We sing revolting songs, using revolting rhymes.
唱起反抗的歌用反抗的韵律	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
We'll be revolting children til our revoltings done,
我们将是叛逆的孩子直到叛逆	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
And we'll have the Trunchbull bolting, we're REVOLTING!
而我们有特朗布隆暴动在即	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
Six:
He got down on one knee but I said no way
他跪下来但我说绝对没料	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
Packed my bags and moved into a nu nu nunneray
我收拾了行李搬进了一个女修道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 14)
Joined the gospel choir, our riffs were on fire
加入福音合唱我们飙高	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
At the top of the charts is where I'm gonna stay
排行榜第一是我永驻的地标	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)

Henry sent me a poem all about my green sleeves
亨利寄给我的诗篇写尽我的绿袖	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 14)
I changed a couple words put it on a sick beat
我换了几个字配上了好节奏	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
The song blew their minds, next minute I was signed
歌喉震撼全场下一秒签收	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
And now I'm writing lyrics for Shakesy P
现在我为薛之谦写歌词伴奏	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)

Since my first son, our family's grown
从我儿子到家家有儿	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
We made a band and got quite well known
组建乐队并广为人知	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
You could perhaps call us the Tudor Von Trapps
也许你可以叫我们达芬奇	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
I'm just kidding, we're called the Royalling Stones
开玩笑我们叫做皇家石	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)

We're one of a kind no category
我们是独一无二的品类	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
Too many years lost in his story
太多年在他故事里亏	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
We're free to take, our crowning glory
我们自由自在地发挥	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
For five more minutes
再多五分钟嘿	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
We're Six
六妹	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -2 len_constraint: 2)

What a shame yeah my face it cost me the crown
多可惜我的美貌丢了王冠	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
So I moved to the Haus of Holbein in my hometown
于是我迁居故乡的霍布海姆宫殿	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 14)
His mates were super arty, but I showed them how to party
他的朋友们很文艺但我教会他们狂欢	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 16)
Now on my tour of Prussia everybody gets down
现在我普鲁士巡回演出开始前	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)

Music man tried it on and I was like bye
音乐人试了试我说了再见	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
So I thought "Who needs him?", I can give it a try
于是我想谁需要他我试试看	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
I learned everything, Now all I do is sing
我学了很多现在只唱不练	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
And I'll do that until I die
我会这么做到死前	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)

Heard all about these rockin' chicks
听说这些摇滚女孩	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
Loved every song and each remix
每首歌每首混音爱	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
So I went out and found them, And we lay down an album
我出去找他们然后一起拍了专辑	(rhyme type: 4 scores: 0 len_constraint: 14)
Now I don't need your love, all I need is Six
现在我需要的不是你的爱	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
WavingThroughAWindow:
Step out, step out of the sun
走出来迎着阳光	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
If you keep getting burned
若你继续烫伤	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
Step out, step out of the sun
走出来享受阳光	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Because you've learned, because you've learned
因为你已学会了谎	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)

On the outside always looking in
在外总是在看着而已	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
Will I ever be more than I've always been?
我会不会超越过去的自己	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 11)
'cause I'm tap, tap, tapping on the glass
因为我在敲打着玻璃	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
I'm waving through a window
隔着窗挥着手臂	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)

I try to speak, but nobody can hear
我试着说话但没人听见	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)
So I wait around for an answer to appear
我就在这四处等待答案出现	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
While I'm watch, watch, watching people pass
当人们走过我的眼帘	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
I'm waving through a window
隔着窗挥手致贤	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
Oh, can anybody see,
哦谁能够看得见	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
is anybody waving back at me?
是否有人向我招手致歉	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -2 len_constraint: 10)

We start with stars in our eyes
我们从满眼星河	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 7)
We start believing that we belong
我们开始相信我们是	(rhyme type: 4 scores: 0 len_constraint: 9)
But every sun doesn't rise
但每日日出没	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
And no one tells you where you went wrong
却没人告诉你哪里错	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)

When you're falling in a forest
当你在森林里坠落	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
and there's nobody around
周围没有人能干涉	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
Do you ever really crash,
有没有真正坠毁过	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
or even make a sound
甚至不作声吔	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 6)
Man:
Hear me now, O thou bleak and unbearable world
听到我吧你荒凉不堪的尘世	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
Thou art base, and debauched as can be
妳卑鄙无耻下流至极	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
And a knight, with his banners all bravely unfurled
一个骑士勇敢地展开他的旗	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
Now hurls down his gauntlet to thee
他向你挑战下武器	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)

I am I, Don Quixote, the Lord of La Mancha
我是堂吉诃德马恩查省的君王	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
My destiny calls and I go
命运召唤我便前往	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
And the wild winds of fortune, will carry me onward
和狂野的幸运风将我带向前方	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 13)
Oh whithersoever they blow
不管他们吹向哪方	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
Whithersoever they blow, onward to glory I go
不论风向我将朝着荣耀奔向前方	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -2 len_constraint: 14)

Hear me heathens and wizards and serpents of sin
听吧异教徒巫医和罪恶之蛇	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
All your dastardly doings are past
你的卑鄙都是过去的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 9)
For a holy endeavor is now to begin
一场神圣的事业就要开始了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 12)
And virtue shall triumph at last
正义终会战胜邪恶	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8)
LetItGo:
The snow glows white on the mountain tonight, Not a footprint, to be seen
